name: lobster-inference
description: Access pretrained protein language models for sequence analysis, embeddings, concept prediction, and interventions
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server providing access to Lobster protein language models including masked language models (PMLM) and concept bottleneck models (CBM-PMLM). Supports sequence embeddings, biological concept analysis, sequence interventions, and naturalness scoring with models ranging from 24M to 3B parameters.

tools.name: list_models
tools.description: List all available pretrained Lobster models and current device information

tools.name: get_representations
tools.description: Get vector embeddings for protein sequences using Lobster models

tools.name: get_concepts
tools.description: Analyze biological concepts present in sequences using concept bottleneck models

tools.name: intervene_sequence
tools.description: Modify sequences to increase/decrease specific biological concepts

tools.name: get_supported_concepts_list
tools.description: Get list of supported concepts for a concept bottleneck model

tools.name: compute_sequence_naturalness
tools.description: Compute likelihood/naturalness scores for protein sequences
